Posts.Content: Hi I'm Chris I would like to know how do you survive cancer when every thing gets taken away from you ? after all the so called treatment and what the Doctor calls unforeseen complications I can't even work the worst thing that could have happen to me so now I'm loosing every thing I worked for all my life and it's coming soon by the end of the month as for family they were their as long as I had money when it was gone so were they I was too stupid to know what they were doing see I'm old school I don't think that way so here I sit trying to figure out how I'm going to get my car fixed so I can at least live in it oh well so much for my sad sob story if anyone has an idea let me know Thanks
Posts.Title: surviving after cancer
